title: Star in a Bottle
summaries: The Star in a Bottle is a Lantern variant. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it provides players in its vicinity with an increased rate of mana regeneration. The buff is applied to any players standing within a rectangular area of 170×125 tiles centered on the bottle, similar to the Campfire and Heart Lantern. Similarly to other Lanterns, the Star in a Bottle is a mechanism that can be toggled on or off if wired, though this does not affect the buff.

The Star in a Bottle provides an extra 1 mana per second. However, on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, it grants 5 mana per second, additionally slight reducing the cooldown of mana regeneration after using magic weapons.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, it does not provide any buff, and is only for decorative lighting.
